metadata.name: Colore Calore Movimento
metadata.description:
For me, color is a metaphor for life because like the seasons of the year, life also has its seasons.
This work of mine is a hymn, a tribute to life, to hope, to movement.
I represented the colors and the symbolism that distinguishes them individually, through my abstract photographic works, but drawn from reality, from uncontaminated nature and my favorite source of inspiration.
